alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 4:41PM EDT until April 06 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Northeastern Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Grady County in southwestern Georgia... Southern Thomas County in south central Georgia... Southwestern Brooks County in south central Georgia... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 440 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles south of Thomasville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Quitman, Thomasville, Boston, Pavo, Barwick, Alma, Thomasville Municipal A/P, Grooverville, Dillon, Everett, Rocky Hill, Miccosukee, Brooks Co A/p, Fincher, Dixie, Moncrief, Festus, Patten, Eason and Oaklawn. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for south central and southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for south central and southwestern Georgia.
